Package org.jdrupes.httpcodec.protocols.http

Class HttpField<T>

java.lang.Object
org.jdrupes.httpcodec.protocols.http.HttpField<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the header field’s value
public class HttpField<T>
extends Object
A base class for all kinds of header field values.
See Also:
“MessageHeaders”

  • Constructor Details

    • HttpField

      public HttpField​(String name, T value, Converter<T> converter)
      Creates a new representation of a header field with the given value and converter.

      For fields with a constant definition in this class, the name is normalized.

      Parameters:
      name - the field name
      value - the value
      converter - the converter

    • HttpField

      public HttpField​(String headerLine, Converter<T> converter) throws ParseException
      Creates a new representation of a header field from its textual representation.

      For fields with a constant definition in this class, the name is normalized.

      Parameters:
      headerLine - the header line
      converter - the converter
      Throws:
      ParseException - if an error occurs while parsing the header line

  • Method Details

    • lookupConverter

      public static Converter<?> lookupConverter​(String fieldName)
      Returns the proper converter for the header field with the given name.

      Works for all well known field names, i.e. the field names defined as constants in this class. If the field name is unknown, a string converter is returned.

      Parameters:
      fieldName - the field name
      Returns:
      the converter

    • name

      public String name()
      Returns the header field name.
      Returns:
      the name

    • value

      public T value()
      Returns the header field’s parsed value.
      Returns:
      the field’s value

    • converter

      public Converter<T> converter()
      Returns the cconverter used by this field.
      Returns:
      the converter

    • setValue

      public HttpField<T> setValue​(T value)
      Sets the header field’s value.
      Parameters:
      value - the new value
      Returns:
      the field for easy chaining

    • asFieldValue

      public String asFieldValue()
      Returns the string representation of this field’s value.
      Returns:
      the field value as string

    • asHeaderField

      public String asHeaderField()
      Returns the string representation of this header field as it appears in an HTTP message.

      Note that the returned string may span several lines (may contain CR/LF), but is has no trailing CR/LF.

      Returns:
      the field as it occurs in a header

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
